additionalfeatures: Audio recording, direct print, USB 2.0 compatibility, RGB primary colour filter, date/time stamp, DPOF support, digital image rotation, PictBridge support, in-camera red-eye removal, cropping an image, resizing an image, Automatic Scene Recognition (SR Auto), instant zoom, 720p HD movie recording, face detection, YouTube capture mode, Exif Print support, Motion Panorama, Zoom Bracketing mode
supportedmemorycards: SD Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card
facedetection: Blink Detection technology, Face Recognition, Smile Capture, Smile Shutter
shootingprograms: Landscape, portrait mode, night mode, text, party/indoor, fireworks, flower, sports mode, sunset, beach, night (tripod), natural light, snow, baby, natural light & with flash, smile shutter, motion panorama, zoom bracketing
lightsensitivity: ISO 100, ISO 800, ISO 400, ISO 200, ISO 64, ISO 1600, ISO auto, ISO 3200 (3Mpix), ISO 6400 (3Mpix)
details: 1 x Fujifilm NP-85 Li-ion rechargeable battery ( included )
videocapture: MJPEG - 1280 x 720 - 30 fps MJPEG - 640 x 480 - 30 fps MJPEG - 320 x 240 - 30 fps
whitebalancepresets: Fine, incandescent, shade, fluorescent light (cool white), fluorescent light (daylight), fluorescent light (warm white)
continuousshootingspeed: 8 frames per second, 1.2 frames per second, 3.3 frames per second
includedaccessories: Battery charger, lens cap, shoulder strap, USB cable, A/V cable, lens cap strap
flashmodes: Fill-in mode, slow synchro, auto mode, flash OFF mode, red-eye reduction

effectiveflashrange: 0.4 m - 7 m : ISO auto ( wide lens ) 2.5 m - 4.1 m : ISO auto ( tele lens ) 0.3 m - 3 m : ISO auto ( macro lens )
